title: Venezuela will ask Spain for compensation for looting during colonialism
text:
Maduro established his position after congratulating and supporting the evolution undergone by the Caribbean countries
Village.- This was reported by the president of Venezuela , Nicolás Maduro, during this Monday’s episode of his program Con Maduro + He will seek reparations from Spain for the plundering, pillaging and slavery against the country’s native populations.
Throughout the program, the President established his position after congratulating and supporting the evolution achieved by the Caribbean countries, who demand immediate compensation from the colonizers for the violation of their rights.
On the other hand, and The president assured that Venezuela and other countries in the region will make a profound request, to ensure they are able to take that definitive step.
President Maduro stated that “532 years ago The process of resistance to colonialism and slavery occurred, which left a legacy of Nazism and fascism. (…) No one has asked for forgiveness, we take refuge in the ideology of denialism (…) From Spain this barbaric event is endorsed and claimed as a process of civilisation”. He also pointed out that Spanish explorer Christopher Columbus ‘ invasion of indigenous peoples was a criminal act and abuses against indigenous populations.
The Venezuelan Minister for Indigenous Peoples , Clara Vidal, in her speech at the program, underlined that indigenous peoples have reclaimed their culture, resistance and history during the mobilization for the end of capitalism.
